title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1203.2 - Motorcycles, motor scooters and motor bicycles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1203.2 - Motorcycles, motor scooters and motor bicycles

State Regulations

Motorcycles, motor scooters and motor bicycles with tire
widths too narrow to pass safely over the roadway expansion joints may be
wheeled but not ridden upon bridge sidewalks. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1203.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
